title: Amazon Linux 2023 - ALAS2023-2023-182: Important priority package update for perl-CPAN
description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2023-31484:
	HTTP::Tiny 0.082, a Perl core module since 5.13.9 and available standalone on CPAN, has an insecure default TLS configuration where users must opt in to verify certificates.
